name: Dai Longao | Code Blaze
body:
### Objective
* Getting my master's degree.
* Try new things.
* Not seeking career opportunities right now.

### Skill
* Algorithm design, analysis and implementation.
* Web development: Javascript (AngularJS, NodeJS, CoffeeScript, etc.), HTML, HTML5, PHP, CSS.
* Programming Languages: C/C++, Python, Ruby, etc.
* Rich experience with programming education.
* Basic network security skill.
* Quick learning.

### Working Experience
* Oct 2013 - Jun 2015, Co-founder of Hangzhou Zhimou Technology Co.,LTD, Hangzhou

### Education
* Sep 2011 - Jun 2015, Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University
* Sep 2015 - present, Master's degree in Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
